jobsJson.descriptionPlain: A project manager is responsible for planning, overseeing and leading projects from ideation through to completion. This position requires a lot of interaction with multiple internal and external stakeholders. A project manager will be working under the strategic project team with purposes to incubate and experiment with new processes while also providing actionable customer insights that will affect the direction and the decisions making for our business process improvements.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Provide recommendations to and discuss with the related stakeholders in improving the existing business processes and work with them in implementing the recommendations to ensure alignment across teams.
  • Lead project planning sessions with related stakeholders
  • Create project plans, requirements, and timelineDoes an analysis of the existing situation that needs to be improvedIdentify current market trends for specific problems and/or situations
  • Decide on project success metrics i.e. cost, lead time, customer satisfactionCalculate and hire the number of headcount/staff a project needs to be completed
  • Incubate and experiment on business process improvements 
  • Manage project progress and iteration if needed
  • Maintain project target 
  • Conduct periodic review with related stakeholders to gather feedback regarding the existing improved processes
  • Create detailed project reports to management

• Bachelor’s degree from top universities
  • 2 - 3 years of working experience, preferably in customer experience and operations in Tech Startup or experience working in a consulting firm
  • Experienced in leading a team
  • Agile, organized and has a huge sense of ownershipGreat stakeholder management and attention to details
  • Preferred Skills: Google Suite, Microsoft Excell: Advanced(e.g. VLOOKUP, INDEX+MATCH, SUMIFS. VBA/Macro is a plus)
